ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026**  
Taking place on February 21, 2026, the Footprints Festival celebrates a rich tapestry of global sounds and genres, featuring 19 talented artists from 12 different countries. With acts hailing from Germany, the UK, Nigeria, Iran, and beyond, this year’s lineup showcases an eclectic mix of musical styles, from Electronic and Psychedelic to Malian Desert Blues, Traditional Iranian, and UK Garage. The festival’s diversity reflects its commitment to embracing both traditional and contemporary sounds, creating a truly unique musical experience.

This year, Footprints Festival highlights a wide range of voices, with a strong emphasis on representation. Over half of the artists are people of color, and the lineup includes a mix of male, female, and mixed-gender acts. While the majority of artists have Spotify links available, the festival continues to spotlight emerging and lesser-known talent alongside acclaimed performers, ensuring a balance of discovery and familiarity for music lovers.

With an impressive average rating of 8.33 from attendees, Footprints Festival 2026 promises a high-quality lineup that has already garnered significant praise. Notably, nearly 87% of the rated artists scored an 8 or higher, reflecting the festival’s careful curation. Whether you’re looking to dance to the beats of UK Garage and House, or lose yourself in the soulful sounds of Psychedelic Folk and Gospel, Footprints Festival is set to be a vibrant celebration of music, culture, and global artistry.
